text: Light of God may refer to: *Divine light, a religious concept **Inward light, a Quaker religious concept **Nūr (Islam), an Islamic religious concept ==See also== *Dominus illuminatio mea, a Latin motto meaning "the Lord is my light" *Neri (given name), a name of obscure origin biblically meaning "light of God" *Nurullah, an Arabic name meaning "light of God" *Uriel, meaning "the light of God" per the Book of Enoch
title: Light of God
